hero.title: About Georgian Education Initiative
hero.subtitle: Empowering the future of Georgia through innovative education and community engagement since 2009.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To transform education in Georgia by providing innovative learning opportunities, supporting educators, and fostering a culture of academic excellence that empowers students to reach their full potential and become active contributors to society.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading educational organization in Georgia, recognized for excellence in innovative teaching methodologies, comprehensive student support, and meaningful community engagement that creates lasting positive impact.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: Fifteen years of dedication to educational excellence and community impact

values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

impact.subtitle: Numbers that tell the story of our commitment to education

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Our dedicated team of educators, researchers, and community leaders work together to create meaningful change in Georgia's educational landscape.

timeline.title: Foundation
timeline.description: Georgian Education Initiative was established with a vision to transform education in Georgia.

timeline.title: First Major Project
timeline.description: Launched our flagship Digital Literacy Program reaching 50 rural schools.

timeline.title: National Recognition
timeline.description: Received the National Education Excellence Award for innovative teaching methods.

timeline.title: International Partnerships
timeline.description: Established partnerships with leading educational institutions across Europe.

timeline.title: Digital Transformation
timeline.description: Pioneered comprehensive online learning platforms during the pandemic.

timeline.title: Future Forward
timeline.description: Expanding our reach to serve over 10,000 students across Georgia.

values.description: We embrace new technologies and methodologies to enhance educational outcomes.

values.description: We believe in the power of partnerships and working together with communities.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for the highest quality in all our programs and initiatives.

values.title: Compassion
values.description: We approach our work with empathy and understanding for all stakeholders.

values.title: Equity
values.description: We ensure equal access to educational opportunities for all students.

values.title: Global Perspective
values.description: We incorporate international best practices while respecting local culture.

featuredPublication.title: Featured Publication
featuredPublication.publicationTitle: Digital Literacy Impact in Rural Georgian Schools
featuredPublication.description: Our latest research study examines the transformative impact of digital literacy programs in rural communities across Georgia. This comprehensive study involved 50 schools and over 2,000 students, providing valuable insights into the effectiveness of technology integration in education.

featuredArticle.title: Featured Article
featuredArticle.articleTitle: The Future of Education in Georgia: Embracing Digital Transformation
featuredArticle.description: In this comprehensive article, Dr. Nino Kalandadze explores how digital transformation is reshaping education in Georgia. From the integration of technology in classrooms to the development of digital literacy skills, this piece examines the challenges and opportunities facing our educational system.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Get in touch with us to learn more about our programs or to get involved

getInTouch.title: Get In Touch
getInTouch.description: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have questions about our programs, want to get involved, or just want to learn more, we're here to help.

map.title: Interactive Map
map.description: Our office location in Tbilisi, Georgia

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our organization and programs

questions.question: How can I get involved with your programs?
questions.answer: There are many ways to get involved! You can volunteer, donate, partner with us, or participate in our training programs. Contact us to learn more about specific opportunities.

questions.question: Do you offer training programs for teachers?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive professional development programs for educators. Our training covers modern teaching methodologies, technology integration, and student engagement strategies.

questions.question: How can I donate to support your work?
questions.answer: You can donate through our website, by bank transfer, or by contacting us directly. All donations go directly to supporting our educational programs across Georgia.

questions.question: Do you work with schools outside of Tbilisi?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We work with schools throughout Georgia, with a particular focus on rural and underserved communities. Our programs reach students and teachers across the country.

contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.
